name: The Floor is Freezing
description:
Made in under 3 hours for Trijam 55.

Your parents left you home to your own devices.  Collect as many presents as you can avoiding the freezing floor!

Controls:  Arrow keys to move (left, right, up, and down)

Credits - Art and Music:

  • Snowy Tiles and Sprites by AXLplosion (https://axlplosion.itch.io/snowy-tiles-and-sprites)
  • Animals Wearing Jackets Asset Pack by snailscode (https://snailscode.itch.io/animals-wearing-jackets-mini-asset-pack)
